inclusion.criterion: 18-80 years old, both males and females
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Single or dual chamber ICD or BiVentricular ICD in situ
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Receive a single shock from their ICD for monomorphic ventricular tachycardia
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: 40 seconds of VT and then bradycardia with a rate of 39 shortly thereafter corresponding with his symptoms

exclusion.criterion: ICD shock for polymorphic VT/VF or inappropriate shock
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous ventricular tachycardia ablation within 1 year
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: NYHA Class IV heart failure or current inotrope therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Listed for heart transplant or LVAD
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant as determined by urine pregnancy test prior to NIPS
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He received a cardiac monitoring device which showed VT and bradycardia corresponding with symptoms.
